title: Sonic Mania is pretty good yo
body:
Only $20 and you can tell this was made by people who love Sonic. You can see the polish and the subtle details that the main studio seems to have lost sight of. It's got that classic gameplay with some small additions to the mechanics that don't take over the experience, yet feels new..but still nostalgic.

They pulled it off and I'm very impressed. Even Arin Hanson likes it!
